titles.title: Alternative Minimum Tax Reform Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide corporate alternative minimum tax reform.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/27/2007--Introduced. Alternative Minimum Tax Reform Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow corporate taxpayers to offset alternative minimum tax liabilities with long-term unused minimum tax credits and increased net operating loss allowances.
